data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Hero,
        Spinner,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

<Button palette="affirmative" disabled>

<Hero.Container margin_top="medium">
    <Hero.Header>Loading</Hero.Header>
    <Hero.Section padding_bottom="medium">
        <Spinner size="medium" />

</Hero.Container>
data.title: Spinner Preview
